Jetty Line Installation Project at Shell LOBP, Karachi

Supply, Fabrication, Erection, Testing & Commissioning of New 8 inch diameter and 1.5 km length pipelines from dry berth DB-01 and Oil pier OP-2 to Shell Lubricant Oil Blending Plant Located in Oil Installation Area, Karachi. The project’s scope of work includes the following activities:

  • Validation of Piping Design
  • Material Procurement
  • Blasting & Application of Marine Painting
  • Development of Civil Foundations & Field Supports
  • Cleaning & Hydrotesting
  • Fabrication & Installation of Pig Launchers
  • Supply & Installation of Valves
  • Supply & Installation of Thermal Relief Valves and Pig Signaller

Start Date: March 31, 2020

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
